content: {"name": "Community Servings", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Community Servings provides home-delivered meals and nutrition services to individuals and families living with critical and chronic illnesses. Their made-from-scratch meals are medically tailored \u2013 meaning they\u2019re customized to meet the nutritional and medical needs of their clients who are fighting illnesses like HIV/AIDS, diabetes, cancer, kidney disease, and many others. They deliver and ship medically tailored meals meals to clients across Massachusetts. For clients that reside outside of their delivery area, meals are shipped. They provide meals for the client and family members including a caregiver (parent/spouse), and children under the age of 18. For more information or to apply, please contact Client Services at 617.522.7777 or apply online at https://www.servings.org/meal-delivery/application-process/", "email": "", "url": "https://www.servings.org/meal-delivery/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 522-7777", "type": "voice"}]}
